snippet: The year-on-year growth was the slowest since the third quarter of 2012.
abstract: Chinese government announces that country's inflation-adjusted economic output in first quarter was up 7.4 percent from year ago, slower rate of growth than fourth quarter of of 2013; news confirms concerns of investors and economists.
lead_paragraph: The year-on-year growth was the slowest since the third quarter of 2012.

headline.main: Growth Rose 7.4% in First Quarter, China Reports
headline.print_headline: Growth Rate Rose 7.4% in 1st Quarter, China Reports
